meanings.definition: To make a harsh or loud noise while sleeping.
meanings.sent1: My dad tends to snore loudly at night.
meanings.sent2: I can hear my brother snore in the next room.
meanings.sent3: The bear in the story would snore so loudly that it woke up the whole forest.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine would snore and sputter before finally starting.
meanings.sent5: The wind outside would snore through the trees, creating a peaceful rhythm.

meanings.definition: A harsh or loud noise made while sleeping.
meanings.sent1: The loud snore coming from the bedroom woke me up.
meanings.sent2: His snore was so loud that it could be heard throughout the house.
meanings.sent3: The cat's snore sounded like a tiny trumpet playing in the room.
meanings.sent4: The distant snore of the train passing by echoed through the night.
meanings.sent5: The deep snore of the bear in the cave made the hikers freeze in fear.
